flawed_nl_solution:
Dimes are worth $0.10 and Barry has $10 worth of dimes so he has 10/0.1 = <<10/0.1=10>>10 dimes
Dan has half the amount of dimes as Barry so Dan has 10/2 = <<10/2=5>>5 dimes
Dan finds 2 more dimes on his way home so he now has 5+2 = <<5+2=7>>7 dimes
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 10. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
